What is NYPS?

Slam poetry is a concept underground but old in the US, parts of Europe and Australia - where mostly marginalised communities found it as a medium for expression, especially to voice their opinion or just to create art as a sign of defiance. In India, slam poetry didn’t exist until 2012 - there was protest poetry but not slam poetry. Airplane Poetry Movement was started.
